nodes.text: Marocsaa subclan rings were a type of double ring worn by members of the Marocsaa subclan. Double rings were worn on two fingers, with twin circlets connected by a flexible mesh. After the Nikardun Destiny invaded Paccosh territory, Uingali foar Marocsaa gave his ring to Mitth'raw'nuruodo in the hopes that it would keep the memory of his people alive. Thrawn eventually returned the ring to Uingali, but adopted the symbol of the chimaera as his personal symbol, even commanding a Star Destroyer bearing the creature’s name.
